password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update wt_admin set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wt_admin_expend_id = #{wtAdminExpendId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id,user_name,password,mobile_phone,wt_admin_expend_id,company_name,cat_id from wt_admin where user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id from wt_admin where mobile_phone = #{phone}
